overview: Don Ateng Singaleon throws a party and the beautiful Dona Vivi attends and immediately gains Iskak Kreoliboâ€™s attention. But the party is disrupted by the arrival of the Kribo tribe who want to seek revenge for an incident at the lake. One day, Papai the sailor appears and he gets along well with Dona Vivi until Iskak becomes jealous. Later, Iskak uses the Kribo tribe to help him get his way. The story itself can be considered superfluous as they merely set up the jokes for the scenes.
title: Ateng The Godfather
